actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to establish a District of Columbia Armory Board, and for other purposes," and the District of Columbia Stadium Act of 1957.

summary.text: Increases the amount of obligations that may be incurred by the Armory Board in the District of Columbia for athletic events, conventions, concerts, and like activities from $50,000 to $200,000. Increases the Armory Board Capital Working Fund from $100,000 to $400,000. Requires the difference between receipts from parking and operating expenses incurred in parking cars under the D.C. Stadium Act to be placed into the Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to establish a District of Columbia Armory Board, and for other purposes," and the District of Columbia Stadium Act of 1957.
